Eyvazov's powerful tenor performance on this album was praised for its emotional depth and vocal precision. The album's collaboration with a renowned orchestra and conductor also contributed to its critical acclaim. This award placed Eyvazov alongside other leading opera artists, further solidifying his reputation in contemporary opera recordings.
